text: "_We know what it means to serve._"

attachments.title: What is Slack?
attachments.Pretext: Welcome to Slack! I am the WelcomingBot and my job is to get you situated as fast as possible so you can start using Slack!
attachments.text: Slack is a new collaboration tool that ties together your work and colleagues into one big communication hub. Slack utilizes channels for organized conversations along with a searchable archieve of your team's documents, decisions, events etc., putting knowledge in everyone's hand.

attachments.title: Who should I contact if I have questions?
attachments.text:
•	You can find help in the #slack-help channel
•	Vist the <https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us|Slack Help Wiki> website for offical documentation

Not finding what you are looking for? Please contact us at:
ENT_KNOWLEDGE_SERVIC@INTERNAL.USAA.COM.

attachments.title: Slack End-User Tutorial
attachments.text:
If you have never used Slack before or would like a refresher, click the "Fundamentals for End-Users" link below.
<https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/115005333523|Fundamentals for End-Users>
